WorkItem.Description:
On Vista (32-bit), the handler didn't work until I'd add the extension's GUID to:
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\PreviewHandlers
 
The self-registration code had added the entry to the user equivalent location:
HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\PreviewHandlers
 
...but that didn't work.
 
Also, the project is set to build using the 'C' run-time DLLs, which means you can't just copy the DLL to another machine and register it. It'd be easier if the project built using the non-DLL version of the 'C' run-time.
WorkItem.Summary: Shell Preview Handler doesn't load until a registry key is changed
